cab.content: CONFIDENTIALMilitary Secret From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, 2nd January 1920. (Received 3rd.) 34. 2nd January. Malleson telegraphs 30th December:-" Report from Bajgiranthat Bolsheviks have Brought large twin turret armoured cars to Askabad. Tehraninformed."
